languages.text: "Госпожа Ирлиэт, команда корабля тревожилась бы меньше, если бы вы хоть немного усилий прилагали к тому, чтобы их не пугать".
"Mistress Yrliet, the ship's crew would be less alarmed if you made the slightest effort not to frighten them."
languages.original_text: "Госпожа Ирлиэт, команда корабля тревожилась бы меньше, если бы вы хоть немного усилий прилагали к тому, чтобы их не пугать".

traits.locale_text: "Mistress Yrliet, the ship's crew would be less alarmed if you made the slightest effort not to frighten them."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Mistress Yrliet, the ship's crew would be less alarmed if you made the slightest effort not to frighten them."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Mistress Yrliet, the ship's crew would be less alarmed if you made the slightest effort not to frighten them."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Mistress Yrliet, the ship's crew would be less alarmed if you made the slightest effort not to frighten them."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “伊莉耶特小姐，但凡你稍微注意一点儿，也不会把船员们吓成这样。”
languages.original_text: "Mistress Yrliet, the ship's crew would be less alarmed if you made the slightest effort not to frighten them."

traits.locale_text: “伊莉耶特小姐，但凡你稍微注意一点儿，也不会把船员们吓成这样。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « L'équipage du vaisseau serait sans doute moins inquiet de votre présence si vous faisiez ne serait-ce qu'un petit effort pour ne pas les effrayer, maîtresse Yrliet. »
languages.original_text: "Mistress Yrliet, the ship's crew would be less alarmed if you made the slightest effort not to frighten them."

traits.locale_text: « L'équipage du vaisseau serait sans doute moins inquiet de votre présence si vous faisiez ne serait-ce qu'un petit effort pour ne pas les effrayer, maîtresse Yrliet. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Herrin Yrliet, die Crew des Schiffs wäre weniger alarmiert, wenn Ihr Euch nur die kleinste Mühe geben würdet, ihnen keine Angst zu machen."
languages.original_text: "Mistress Yrliet, the ship's crew would be less alarmed if you made the slightest effort not to frighten them."

traits.locale_text: "Herrin Yrliet, die Crew des Schiffs wäre weniger alarmiert, wenn Ihr Euch nur die kleinste Mühe geben würdet, ihnen keine Angst zu machen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「ミストレス・ユリエット、乗組員たちを怖がらせない努力を少しでもすれば、船員たちもそれほど心配することもなかっただろう」
languages.original_text: "Mistress Yrliet, the ship's crew would be less alarmed if you made the slightest effort not to frighten them."

traits.locale_text: 「ミストレス・ユリエット、乗組員たちを怖がらせない努力を少しでもすれば、船員たちもそれほど心配することもなかっただろう」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Señora Yrliet, la tripulación de la nave estaría menos alarmada si hiciera el más mínimo esfuerzo para no asustar a sus integrantes».
languages.original_text: "Mistress Yrliet, the ship's crew would be less alarmed if you made the slightest effort not to frighten them."

traits.locale_text: «Señora Yrliet, la tripulación de la nave estaría menos alarmada si hiciera el más mínimo esfuerzo para no asustar a sus integrantes».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "Mistress Yrliet, the ship's crew would be less alarmed if you made the slightest effort not to frighten them."

languages.text: "Yrliet Hanım, ürkünçlük konusuna en azından asgari ölçüde dikkat edersen gemi mürettebatı bu kadar telaşlanmaz."
languages.original_text: "Mistress Yrliet, the ship's crew would be less alarmed if you made the slightest effort not to frighten them."

traits.locale_text: "Yrliet Hanım, ürkünçlük konusuna en azından asgari ölçüde dikkat edersen gemi mürettebatı bu kadar telaşlanmaz."
